data.name: Cypress Template Example 1
data.mergedYaml:
template:
    name: Cypress Template Example 1
    identifier: Cypress_Template_Example_1
    versionLabel: Version1
    type: Stage
    projectIdentifier: Kapil
    orgIdentifier: default
    spec:
        type: Deployment
        spec:
            serviceConfig:
                serviceRef: Very_Big_Service_Name_Really
                serviceDefinition:
                    type: Kubernetes
                    spec:
                        variables: []
                        manifests:
                            - manifest:
                                  identifier: manifest
                                  type: K8sManifest
                                  spec:
                                      store:
                                          type: Git
                                          spec:
                                              connectorRef: sdf
                                              gitFetchType: Branch
                                              paths:
                                                  - /
                                              repoName: manifest
                                              branch: master
                                      skipResourceVersioning: false
            infrastructure:
                environmentRef: prod_environment
                infrastructureDefinition:
                    type: KubernetesDirect
                    spec:
                        connectorRef: test1111
                        namespace: par-ash
                        releaseName: release-<+INFRA_KEY>
                allowSimultaneousDeployments: false
            execution:
                steps:
                    - step:
                          type: ShellScript
                          name: Step 1
                          identifier: Step_1
                          spec:
                              shell: Bash
                              onDelegate: true
                              source:
                                  type: Inline
                                  spec:
                                      script: echo ls
                              environmentVariables: []
                              outputVariables: []
                              executionTarget: {}
                          timeout: 10m
                    - stepGroup:
                          name: Step Group 1
                          identifier: Step_Group_1
                          steps:
                              - step:
                                    type: ShellScript
                                    name: Grouped Step 1
                                    identifier: Grouped_Step_1
                                    spec:
                                        shell: Bash
                                        onDelegate: true
                                        source:
                                            type: Inline
                                            spec:
                                                script: echo ls
                                        environmentVariables: []
                                        outputVariables: []
                                        executionTarget: {}
                                    timeout: 10m
                              - step:
                                    type: ShellScript
                                    name: Grouped Step 2
                                    identifier: Grouped_Step_2
                                    spec:
                                        shell: Bash
                                        onDelegate: true
                                        source:
                                            type: Inline
                                            spec:
                                                script: echo ls
                                        environmentVariables: []
                                        outputVariables: []
                                        executionTarget: {}
                                    timeout: 10m
                rollbackSteps:
                    - step:
                          name: Rollback Rollout Deployment
                          identifier: rollbackRolloutDeployment
                          type: K8sRollingRollback
                          timeout: 10m
                          spec: {}
            serviceDependencies: []
        failureStrategies:
            - onFailure:
                  errors:
                      - AllErrors
                  action:
                      type: StageRollback
data.yaml:
template:
    name: Cypress Template Example 1
    identifier: Cypress_Template_Example_1
    versionLabel: Version1
    type: Stage
    projectIdentifier: Kapil
    orgIdentifier: default
    spec:
        type: Deployment
        spec:
            serviceConfig:
                serviceRef: Very_Big_Service_Name_Really
                serviceDefinition:
                    type: Kubernetes
                    spec:
                        variables: []
                        manifests:
                            - manifest:
                                  identifier: manifest
                                  type: K8sManifest
                                  spec:
                                      store:
                                          type: Git
                                          spec:
                                              connectorRef: sdf
                                              gitFetchType: Branch
                                              paths:
                                                  - /
                                              repoName: manifest
                                              branch: master
                                      skipResourceVersioning: false
            infrastructure:
                environmentRef: prod_environment
                infrastructureDefinition:
                    type: KubernetesDirect
                    spec:
                        connectorRef: test1111
                        namespace: par-ash
                        releaseName: release-<+INFRA_KEY>
                allowSimultaneousDeployments: false
            execution:
                steps:
                    - step:
                          type: ShellScript
                          name: Step 1
                          identifier: Step_1
                          spec:
                              shell: Bash
                              onDelegate: true
                              source:
                                  type: Inline
                                  spec:
                                      script: echo ls
                              environmentVariables: []
                              outputVariables: []
                              executionTarget: {}
                          timeout: 10m
                    - stepGroup:
                          name: Step Group 1
                          identifier: Step_Group_1
                          steps:
                              - step:
                                    type: ShellScript
                                    name: Grouped Step 1
                                    identifier: Grouped_Step_1
                                    spec:
                                        shell: Bash
                                        onDelegate: true
                                        source:
                                            type: Inline
                                            spec:
                                                script: echo ls
                                        environmentVariables: []
                                        outputVariables: []
                                        executionTarget: {}
                                    timeout: 10m
                              - step:
                                    type: ShellScript
                                    name: Grouped Step 2
                                    identifier: Grouped_Step_2
                                    spec:
                                        shell: Bash
                                        onDelegate: true
                                        source:

                                            spec:

                                        environmentVariables: []

                                        executionTarget: {}

                rollbackSteps:
                    - step:
                          name: Rollback Rollout Deployment
                          identifier: rollbackRolloutDeployment
                          type: K8sRollingRollback
                          timeout: 10m
                          spec: {}
            serviceDependencies: []
        failureStrategies:
            - onFailure:
                  errors:
                      - AllErrors
                  action:
                      type: StageRollback
